Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion

Class ExpListFunction<T,​E,​S>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.Expandable<T,​S,​U,​SimpleExpandable<T,​S,​U>>

it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.AccumulatorExpandable<java.util.function.Function<T,​R>,​S,​FunctionExpansion<T,​R,​S>,​T,​R,​A>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.ExpFunction<T,​java.util.List<E>,​S,​java.util.Set<E>>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.ExpListFunction<T,​E,​S>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the ListFunction input
E - The type of the ListFunction result's list element
S - The type of the supported expansions' marker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.function.Function<T,​java.util.List<E>>
public class ExpListFunction<T,​E,​S>
extends ExpFunction<T,​java.util.List<E>,​S,​java.util.Set<E>>
Brief Expandable ListFunction, it represents a special ListFunction that can be expanded with more functions. It executes first the expansive expansions and then the restrictive expansions distinguishing their effect on the expandable by their expansion type
See Also:
ListFunction, ExpFunction
